snippet.title: Chronocide // Teaser
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2696420/Chronocide/

Stop the undead from entering the temporal portals with traps and your weapons. Play the campaign solo or in co-op mode up to 4 players.

Developed by
Northerner Games
